EmailTemplate.name: Case: 1) Auto Response of Case Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: Update for case (#{!Case.CaseNumber})
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
We have received your request: {!Case.Subject} and it has been logged as Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}.
{!Case.Link}
A second notification will be sent soon with both your case manager and a preliminary timeline for completion.
Thank you, your Salesforce Team
